step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you move them.
Excellent work spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
You held the position well. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid leaning forward.
Great job reversing the motion. Try to maintain the elbow position as you return to the start.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and elbows closer to your head as you move. This helps you get the most out of the stretch.
